EmailTemplate.description: HAE: Email Template when a Case status is changed from <New> to <In progress>
EmailTemplate.name: HAE Case Status Change From New To InProgress Notification To Contact
EmailTemplate.subject: The Case [{!Case.CaseNumber}] has been picked up for processing.
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {!Case.Contact},
The case with Case Number [{!Case.CaseNumber}] has been picked up for processing. We will keep you posted with the updates on your request.
Thanks,
Customer Services Team,
Haemonetics Corporation
